FinishText: Wherever you go, I will be by your side, in the warmth of the sunlight, in the comfort of the night breeze... like an unfaltering shadow.
As long as everyone and you get to live, that will be the greatest proof that I, Liv of Gray Raven,\nhave stood and fought until my very last breath.
To reclaim Earth, to go home... BPN08, you are our only hope.
